metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23962 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incorrect use of the '<RowCountChanged>' method could have led to a user-after-poison and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 85.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
